amendment.description: Amendment requires schools and libraries to use filtering technology if they accept Federal subsidies to connect to the Internet.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 41 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to require schools and libraries to implement a filtering or blocking technology for computers with internet access to minors as a condition of the receipt of funding from the universal service fund.

action.text: Franks (NJ) amendment (A038) modified by unanimous consent. A modification to clarify that the filter or block is for internet access during use by minors.
On agreeing to the Franks (NJ) amendment (A038) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
